fields.name: Detonate Effect:
fields.value:
- Whoever detonated this, as well as any player standing on this directly next to it on the <:builder:1119843481700012103> pile, becomes **Injured**.
- In addition, this will remove itself from the <:builder:1119843481700012103> pile and deal 3 hits to every adjacent block.

fields.name: Dud Effect:
fields.value:
- It stays on the <:builder:1119843481700012103> pile, and does nothing when stepped on or broken.
_ _
- If this is disarmed, it leaves the <:builder:1119843481700012103> pile and enters the hand of whoever disarmed it.
- This card is of the Soil subtype, and takes 1 hit to break with a tool that is not meant for it.
